Parent Preview Night and Ice Cream Social August 22nd

Visit our tables for Membership, Photo Buttons, Air Show Volunteering and ofcourse pick up your pre-ordered Ice Cream!

Back to school this week! Evening practices begin! Consult your Band Calendar!

LINKS you need to know:

  • Mr. Vitale’s Website
  • Band Booster’s Website
  • FaceBook North Royalton Band Boosters -- Like Us!!
  • Other Fundraisers: GFS and Smile.Amazon.com (see below)

DATES you need to know:

  • Aug 22 – Parent Preview Night – ICE CREAM SOCIAL FUNDRAISER
  • Aug 26 – First Football Game HOME
  • Aug 29 – Band Booster Meeting -- Media Center @7PM
  • Sept 2 – Football Game HOME
  • Sept 3-5 - Air Show (see below)
  • SEPT 10-11 – FRUIT SALE BLITZ!!

We Need Volunteers!

We are VERY SHORT on volunteers for:

  • AIR SHOW Call Gary -- 440-915-1178
  • CONCESSIONS Call Dawn – 216-990-0271
  • 50/50 RAFFLE Call Elisa – 216-407-5625

Air Show - We Need Volunteers Every Day!

Sign up and spend the day at the Air Show AND raise money for the band! It is a fun day of selling tickets, passing out programs or parking cars. Plenty of breaks and lunch provided. Bring a chair and watch the show! THIS IS ONE OF OUR LARGEST FUNDRAISERS! WE CAN RAISE UP TO $10000 FOR OUR BAND!

Here is the link to our signup form.

Contact: Gary Diehl 440-915-1178

Concessions - We Need Help the First Two Home Games!

We need you to help sell concessions at HOME football games AND Band Fest! The concessions team has a lot of fun and you will get to meet every hungry person in the stadium! Sign up here to volunteer:

Contact: Dawn Rembowski: 216-990-0271

50/50 Raffle - We Need Help Parent Preview Night & Every Game!

Do you like to talk to people? This is the volunteer job for YOU! The tickets sell themselves… you just have to offer them to everyone that comes into the stadium! Some parents even set up small competitions between themselves to see who can sell the most! You are done at half time! Sign up for a great time!

Contact: Elisa Race -- 216-407-5625

Photo Buttons

Purchase your photo buttons at Parent Preview Night! Buttons are $4 each or 3/$10! Photo buttons ordered at Parent Preview Night will be ready for pickup at the SEPT 2 HOME GAME! Questions?

Contact: Debbie Sexton – 440-785-7725

North Royalton Stadium Foundation Car Raffle

Marching Band sales for the car raffle will begin on Tuesday, August 23rd and will end September 30th. Students will be bringing home an envelope on Tuesday afternoon with two raffle tickets and a letter about the raffle sale. Each student is responsible for these tickets so please make sure they are kept in a safe place until they are sold. Many families sold extra tickets last year and we encourage everyone to do the same. Who doesn’t want to win a new car for $20.00? There will also be a $500.00 prize for the student who sells the winning ticket and a 2016 contest hoodie for one lucky student who sells their tickets by the September 30th deadline. Thank you for your participation and Good Luck! Questions?

Contact: Jane Coleman – 440-759-9864

Membership

Our membership drive is underway! JOIN the Band Boosters! There are many membership levels! Bring your completed form to Parent Preview Night or drop it in the White Band Box! Questions?

Signup online

Contact: Shirley Berish – 440-667-0811

Other Fundraisers

GFS:
If you shop at GFS, remember to mention :

North Royalton Band Boosters and Marching Band at checkout. We have an account there and accumulate $$$$ for everything YOU spend!

Smile.Amazon
Are you an Amazon shopper? Set up a SMILE.AMAZON account and a percentage of what you purchase will be added to the North Royalton Band Booster account:

YOU can help North Royalton High School Band Boosters when you shop for back-to-school supplies and many other items that you purchase from Amazon! This link will help you set up your SMILE account!.

Support us when you shop for back-to-school items. #StartWithaSmile at http://smile.amazon.com/ch/34-1817202 and Amazon donates.
